en.全体员工2018年9月14日请到大会议室开会会议内容与全年工作计划有关勿要迟到，: All staff members are requested to attend a meeting in the conference room on September 14, 2018. The contents of the meeting are related to the annual work plan. Don't be late. No leave is allowed
en.基于工业4.0规划，实现工厂全面的信息化，使得未来数字化工厂实现数据实时化、信息: Based on industrial 4.0 planning, realize the comprehensive informatization of factories, make the future digital factories realize real-time data, information visualization, paperless system, intelligent manufacturing, and eventually move towards the intelligent factory model based on industrial 4.0
